ygData.subject: Hi...I am looking for a EQ entusiast (addict) for a TV Interview
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a booker at TechTV and I am looking for an EQ enthusiast (addict) for a live in-studio interview on the show Call for Help . We are interested in talking
ygData.messageBody:
I am a booker at TechTV and I am looking for an EQ enthusiast
(addict) for a live in-studio interview on the show 'Call for Help'.
We are interested in talking about what exactly EQ is, how people get
started, what the allure is and maybe just talk about the phenomenon
a little bit. This will be a live interview in our Sna Francisco
studio so I'm hoping to find someone who lives in the Bay Area and
would be willing to come on TV. Thank you very much for any help you
can render. PLease respond to my email account.

Adam Dreyfus
Booking Manager
adamdreyfus@...
